title: AI in Healthcare: Current Trends and Future Directions
speaker: Dr. Sarah Johnson, Stanford Medical AI Lab
description: An overview of recent advances in AI applications for healthcare, including diagnostic systems, treatment planning, and patient monitoring.

title: Weekly Research Seminar - Transformer Architectures
speaker: PhD Candidate MinJi Park
description: Discussion of recent innovations in transformer-based models for natural language processing.

title: Deep Learning Workshop for Beginners
description: Hands-on workshop covering fundamentals of deep learning, including neural networks, backpropagation, and PyTorch basics. Open to undergraduate and graduate students.

title: PhD Thesis Defense: Multi-modal Learning for Visual Question Answering
speaker: Joon Ho Lee
description: PhD thesis defense examining novel approaches to integrating visual and textual information for improved question answering performance.

title: AI & Society Symposium 2025
description: Two-day symposium bringing together researchers, policymakers, and industry leaders to discuss ethical considerations and societal impacts of AI technologies.

title: Lab Social Event - Spring 2025
description: Informal social gathering for lab members to celebrate the new semester. All members and alumni welcome!

title: Guest Lecture: Reinforcement Learning in Robotics
speaker: Prof. Michael Chen, MIT CSAIL
description: Exploring how reinforcement learning techniques are being applied to robotics challenges, from manipulation to navigation.

title: ICML 2024 Paper Reading Group
description: Weekly reading group session discussing selected papers from ICML 2024.

title: Natural Language Processing Conference (NLPC) 2025
description: Premier international conference on natural language processing. Lab members will be presenting 3 papers.

title: Master's Thesis Defense: Attention Mechanisms in Neural Machine Translation
speaker: Yuna Kim
description: Master's thesis defense exploring novel attention mechanisms to improve neural machine translation quality.
